sequence:
Loaded with Lead and Love

<size=45>Chapter 3 - A Maid's Hobby</size>

scripts.say: Master, are you interested in how we maids spend our everyday life?
If that's the case, please stop by during the next day off. We'll be sure to extend our Royal hospitality to you.
So on the next Sunday, I made my way over to the Royal dormitory and rung the bell...
Master, you're here. Is there something I can do for you?
H-huh...? I thought...
It's a joke. Please come in.
I expected nothing less of Sheffield's room. Impeccable, without a trace of dust.
Here, Master. Please have some black tea.
A Royal maid's skill is truly formidable... a normal person would be hard-pressed to make tea of this caliber.
Well then, Master, you may leave whenever you want.
Somehow... I don't feel like I'm the "Master" here at all...
You're overthinking things. When I said "you may leave whenever you want," I merely meant that you may stay as long as you like.
Then... does that mean other people can't stay as long as they like? Does Sheffield kick them out?
Also, there seems to be something on the table... is this a disassembled pistol?
Guns require maintenance as well. If they are not taken care of, they will stop working, just like lazy commanders.
As terse as ever... Come to think of it, Sheffield, doesn't this gun look a bit like your rigging?
It's just a hobby of mine. Although if you're interested, Master...
Allow me to tell you everything you need to know about "work" firearms, including selection, disassembly, maintenance, accessories, and technique...
It's a bit like drinking out of a fire hose, but your lecture is undoubtedly quite interesting.
... Is that so. In that case, I will make sure your body remembers every detail. Prepare yourself.
Although her voice was still calm as always, I could somehow sense a passion, burning deep within her.
And thus, my day off turned into a seminar on firearms.
